snippet.title: Metrico Gameplay Trailer | PS Vita
snippet.description:
The first official gameplay trailer for infographics action game Metrico. Metrico is a new world. A world consisting of infographics. Metrico will be released in the US the 5th of August, exclusively for the PlayStation Vita. See Metrico in action and learn who's behind the music. It's time for your input. Check out metrico-game.com for more information.

http://metrico-game.com/
